benchmark_details.name: CFBench (Comprehensive Constraints-Following Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: CFBench is a large-scale Chinese benchmark designed to evaluate constraint-following capabilities of Large Language Models (LLMs), featuring 1,000 curated samples that cover over 200 real-life scenarios and more than 50 NLP tasks, integrating diverse constraints within the LLM outputs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the constraints-following capabilities of Large Language Models by providing a comprehensive benchmark that integrates various real-world scenarios and user-defined constraints.

data.source: Curated from real-world scenarios and online instruction data.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on satisfaction of constraints and requirements as per defined scoring rules.
methodology.interpretation: High scores in CSR, ISR, and PSR indicate better compliance with user constraints and satisfaction levels.
methodology.baseline_results: Detailed performance results from evaluated models such as GPT-4o, Claude-3.5-Sonnet.
methodology.validation: Validation through expert assessment and cross-validation among annotators.
